meta.description: Elements of marketing banners at page's top and/or bottom.

blocks.data: 1. Elements of marketing banners at page's top and/or bottom.

bottom.description: Array of HTML content/strings, for custom bottom-banner content; banners are populated from the BigCommerce control panel

top.description: Array of HTML content/strings, for custom top-banner content; banners are populated from the BigCommerce control panel
